key_finding: LinkedIn most blocked (90 requests), GitHub API access blocked (92 requests total) - workflows need GitHub MCP server configuration. Denial rate trending upward from 26.3% to 29.7%.
critical_action: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot engine workflows to enable GitHub API access. Review package registry blocking (npmjs.org, pypi.org).
notes: Report generated for December 26, 2025. Analysis based on cached data from previous analysis. Python visualization libraries unavailable - used text-based analysis. Comprehensive recommendations provided for GitHub MCP configuration and network permission optimization.

concerns: GitHub API blocking affects legitimate workflows
Package registry blocking may affect validation

immediate: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot workflows
Audit workflows with high denial rates
long_term: Set up monitoring and alerting for denial rates >30%
Document required domains per workflow type
